scripts.dev: xcopy /S /Y src\assets dist\ && copy /Y manifest.json dist && parcel watch src/{background.js,content-script.js,popup/popup.html} --target node --bundle-node-modules --no-hmr
scripts.build: xcopy /S /Y src\assets dist\ && copy /Y manifest.json dist && parcel build src/{background.js,content-script.js,popup/popup.html} --target node --bundle-node-modules --no-content-hash --no-minify
scripts.prod: rmdir /S /Q dist && xcopy /S /Y src\assets dist\ && copy /Y manifest.json dist && parcel build src/{background.js,content-script.js,popup/popup.html} --target node --bundle-node-modules --no-content-hash --no-source-maps
